author: COMSOL
description: By engineering a periodic structure with features comparable in scale to the wavelength, it is possible to obtain materials with negative permittivity and permeability. This example demonstrates how to model a domain of a metamaterial with negative permittivity and permeability in the bulk.
label: negative_refractive_index.mph
